intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Nikon F lenses, roughly organized by topic.

lensSpecLinks.name: Roland Vink's Nikon SLR lens table
lensSpecLinks.helpText: T(he most comprehensive Nikon SLR spec table I've found so far)

lensSpecLinks.name: Nikon F Resources at Photography in Malaysia Site

mountHistLinks.name: Detailed Timeline of Nikon F Lens Versions by Roland Vink
General Nikon F Lens History by Stephen Gandy

reviewLinks.name: Lens Reviews at Casual Photophile
reviewLinks.helpText: (High quality articles but their reviews unfortunately only covering a few Nikkor lenses. Highly recommended also for their camera reviews and other articles)

reviewLinks.name: Lens Reviews by Fredrik A. Rasmussen
Lens Survey And Subjective Evaluations by Bjørn Rørslett

repairLinks.name: Search Results for 'Nikkor Lens Repair' playlists on YouTube

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)

miscLinks.name: Visual comparison of Non-Ai, Ai and AiS Nikon mounts by Rick Oleson
Nikon Kenkyukai Tokyo
miscLinks.helpText: (A collector's club site with interesting information on some specialty Nikkor lenses)
